pinyin: chi1 ren2 bu4 tu3 gu3 tou2

definition: to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
human face, beast's heart (idiom); two-faced/malicious and duplicitous
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
jackals, wolves, tigers and panthers (idiom)/animals who are dangerous to man and cattle/fierce and cruel people
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
to force an honest girl into prostitution (idiom)/to debauch
two-faced, three knives (idiom); double-cross/double dealing and back stabbing
